attributes.action: stop so much coverage of football on the BBC
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like to stop the increasing hours that the BBC use to show football. There are other sports that get covered but football is the main one. A solution   to the problem could be to have a new channel for sport, perhaps there could be a multiple range as sports may over run.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the BBC.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
